message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I'm open to discussing this further. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a budget constraint. Can we meet in the middle at $1,350,000?
